BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to premiums for essential workers.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: COVID-19 Relief Package - Premiums for essential workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to just cause employment protections for essential workers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: COVID-19 Relief Package - Just cause employment protections for essential workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the expansion of worker coverage under the Earned Safe and Sick Time Act, and to repeal subdivision f of section 20-913 of such code, relating to exemptions from coverage under the Act, and the undesignated paragraph defining “employee” in section 20-912 of such code
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: COVID-19 Relief Package - Earned Safe and Sick Time Act,

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation clarifying the test for classification of workers as independent contractors or employees by extending the test set forth in Articles 25-B and 25-C of the New York Labor Law to apply to all workers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: COVID-19 Relief Package - Clarifying the test for classification of workers as independent contractors or employees by extending the test set forth in Articles 25-B and 25-C of the New York Labor Law to apply to all workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring health insurance coverage for surviving family members of municipal employees who died as a result of a complication related to the coronavirus disease, COVID-19
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring health insurance coverage for surviving family members of municipal employees who died as a result of a complication related to COVID-19.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation automatically classifying the deaths of all municipal employees who died from COVID-19 as line-of-duty deaths.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Automatically classifying the deaths of all municipal employees who died from COVID-19 as line-of-duty deaths.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to premiums for essential workers.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: COVID-19 Relief Package - Premiums for essential workers.
